title: Awesome Soup Delights - Quick, Easy and Tasty Soup Recipes.pdf G
description:
Cooking Penguin, "Awesome Soup Delights: Quick, Easy and Tasty Soup Recipes"
2013 | ISBN-10: 1482565420 | ASIN: B008HJ2UBS | 72 pages | PDF | 4,6 MB


Health is wealth thats what the proverb goes. People have become health conscious on a premium priority basis and want to go for healthy food habit. Keeping the nutrition intact, people like to have simple and great taste. Soups are easy to prepare, delicious and nutritious. This booklet is a collection of the best homemade soup recipes. If you are having dearth of time, refer this book as a bible for soup preparation. All you have to do is arrange the ingredients, refer the instructions and prepare world class soups at the least possible time.

Preparing soup will definitely be at your finger tips and an added skill for you. This booklet contains range of soup preparation and contains the flavors of Western as well as Eastern cuisines. You will have a full fledged knowledge of how to prepare Indian soups, Chinese soups and American delights as well. If you are a vegetarian or a non vegetarian, you will simply appreciate the easy preparation technique, measurements and procedures. Moreover with various types of soup recipes at hand, you will enjoy the various spices of life. Not necessarily that a five star chef can only prepare world class foods. Remember, life becomes enjoyable when you start enjoying food and most important; Enjoy to prepare world class soups right from your kitchen. Here is just some of what you will learn how to make: * Hot and sour chicken soup * Butternut squash apple soup * White beans and spinach soup * Vegetable creme soup * Prawn and tomato soup * Spinach and tomato soup * Carrot creme soup * Tomato and vermicelli soup * Sweet corn chicken noodles soup * Mutton stew (Indian style) * Bacon and potato cheesy soup * Potato cheese soup * Minestrone soup * Halim (Indian meat soup with mashed carbohydrate) * Lamb cheese soup * Mulligatawny soup And much more!
